tweet.text: PUBLIC PRESENTATION Aug. 30, 2021 at 11am EDT At the #HAC meeting, Joe Wicentowski will discuss the origins and evolution of the #FRUS digital edition To register for this free online event, please send an email to FortJL@state.gov #digitalHistory https://t.co/AyZiBioSv6
